snippet: MTV finds the adorable in menacing Michael Shannon.
abstract: MTV finds the adorable in menacing Michael Shannon.
lead_paragraph: Did you watch the Iowa caucus results last night? Along with Mitt Romney, Rick Santorum and Ron Paul, the winners included Edith Pfeffer and Carolyn Tallet, Clinton County Republican officials who helped explain the vote in a live late-night phone call on CNN, becoming Twitter stars in the process.
